snippet.title: Chicago pediatrician among 3 killed by Afghan guard
snippet.description:
* A Chicago pediatrician who "felt called" to move to Afghanistan to treat children and train physicians was among three Americans killed Thursday at a Kabul hospital by an Afghan guard.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/world/asia/afghanistan-violence/index.html

snippet.title: RealJukebox MP3 for dummies
snippet.description:
* RealNetworks, known for their eponymous and free RealPlayer and RealJukebox programs, also has a commercial version of its MP3centric tool called RealJukebox Plus. You may recall reports of privacy concerns with RealJukebox. A function of RealJukebox automatically associates CDs with their titles and track names by readin...
http://www.cnn.com/2000/TECH/computing/04/03/realjukebox/index.html

snippet.title: How to turn your LPs into CDs or MP3s
snippet.description:
* If you're a music fan, you probably already know that you can turn tracks from a store-bought CD into digital MP3 files. But if you still haven't left the analog age of vinyl LPs or cassettes behind, don't fret: You too can enjoy the fun of making your albums into CDs or putting them into an MP3...

snippet.title: Zoom brings more muscle to everyday audio
snippet.description:
* MP3 players and cell phones are fine for recording the occasional voice memo, but recording a music recital or broadcast-quality interview requires a product with more muscle. The Zoom H2 is not the smallest or best-sounding mobile audio recorder we've come across, but with an unbeatable street price of about $200 and a d...
http://www.cnn.com/2008/TECH/ptech/04/18/zoom.h2/index.html

snippet.title: Top 5 MP3 players
snippet.description:
